rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that transitions into the living area with a view of the courtyard.
Open-plan living area adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and airflow; features Bohemian decor elements such as vintage rugs, eclectic furniture, and plant arrangements.
Modern yet rustic kitchen designed with Vastu principles in mind for energy flow; includes open shelving, a central island, and ample counter space.
The primary bedroom situated on the split-level portion of the ground floor with a private balcony offering garden views; Bohemian decor includes layered textiles and artistic lighting.
A secondary bedroom on the split-level ground floor featuring a spacious balcony overlooking the courtyard for relaxation and fresh air; interior design complements Bohemian aesthetics.
A functional bathroom integrated with natural stone finishes and minimalist decor to enhance Vastu compliance.
Compact utility space for storage and laundry; designed to maintain energy balance as per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Large entrance door allowing a clear view of the courtyard, enhancing natural light and promoting a positive flow of energy.
Pathway leading from the ground floor to the central courtyard, designed with Vastu considerations for connectivity between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Spacious balcony access from bedroom1 providing an intimate view of the garden courtyard, aligning with both Bohemian and Vastu design principles.
Spacious balcony access from bedroom2 offering an expansive view of the courtyard; designed to invite nature and light, consistent with both Bohemian and Vastu guidelines.
Series of windows along the east wall to maximize morning sunlight and adhere to Vastu energy flow.
